item.title: Simple 3D Shelf
item.description: Simple 3D shelf - A simple 3d shelf with Blender and Babylonjs This is a simple 3d shelf, I use: Blender: modeling and export model. Babylonjs: import and show 3d model to web. item.title: Canvas
item.description: Canvas - Choise your canvas style This is a Propressive Web App - PWA to choice canvas. It’s fit to small print shop. My demo at: Canvas demo Build with Vue and Buefy CSS with Bulma

item.title: Bushiroad
item.description: Bushiroad - A simple game like Chrome T-rex My freelance game for my client! It’s a simple runner game like Chrome T-rex! You can play at here: Bushiroad demo. Full source code at here: Bushiroad source My official client website: Bushiroad official website

item.title: Que
item.description: Que - Just tap and dance with stick-man Que’s a lightweight game. Just tap and follow poses in your screen. Que’s mean is stick-man in Vietnamese. Coding in HTML5 and Pixi. Platform All platform build with pure Cordova (lightweight). I’ll release all platform like: iOS, Window, Linux, Mac Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.pico.que Web: https://pico-que.web.app or https://pico-que.firebaseapp.com/. Screenshot:

item.title: Pipi Ghost
item.description: Pipi Ghost - Lightweight and Simple tap game with cute ghost Pipi Ghost - Lightweight and Simple tap game with cute ghost. Just tap to play! Coding in HTML5 and Phaser. Platform Web: https://ghost-d9dfb.web.app or https://ghost-d9dfb.web.app/. Screenshot:

item.title: Nhacuapet
item.description: Nhacuapet - Blog, images and videos for pets This is my website for collection of posts, images and videos for pets. It’s build with Wordpress. I’m design logo with Gravit designer You can visit: Nhacuapet.com Facebook nhacuapet

item.title: Saokim247
